title: Sci-Fi Sounds and Loops Vol.3
description: "Sci-Fi Sounds and Loops" are unique sound effects in WAV 24 Bit 96 kHz format that are suitable for creating a dark, mysterious, alien atmosphere.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

"Sci-Fi Sounds and Loops" are unique sound effects in WAV 24 Bit 96 kHz format that are suitable for creating a dark, mysterious, alien atmosphere.


"Sci-Fi Textures and Loops Vol.3" includes sound effects such as:


• Sci-Fi Alien Noise

• Sci-Fi Crystals

• Sci-Fi Engine Speed Up

• Sci-Fi Engine Speed Up and Slow Down

• Sci-Fi Engine Stop

• Sci-Fi Horror Ambience

• Sci-Fi Laser Shot

• Sci-Fi Plasma Movement

• Sci-Fi Random Signals

• Sci-Fi Retro Sound Effect

• Sci-Fi Short Reverse Effect

• Sci-Fi Soundscape


Each sound effect of this sample pack has 10 variations of different pitches, loop and non-loop versions.


Product Details:

• 220 WAV files

• 96 kHz/24Bit

• 1.20 GB
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 220

Number of Audio Cues: 220

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Sci-Fi Sounds and Loops Vol.3 - Sound-List
